segments.text: My name is James Owen . I ’ m Manager of Sales . How do you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for coming . Did you have any trouble finding the office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no . It was easy . Your office sent me a map .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I apologize for this mess . They ’ Ve got me handling so many projects , and it ’ s hard to keep things organized .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s OK . Thank you for seeing me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . Miss Sun , as you know , we are looking for an executive secretary with good English skills and some business background . We looked over your resume and thought you might be a good candidate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Today's interview is for us to get to know a little about you . If needed , there will be a more lengthy interview later . So , if you ’ re comfortable , let's begin .
segments.speaker: S1
